snippet: The country’s highest court ruled that the crusading attorney general, Claudia Paz y Paz, must step down in May, seven months before her four-year term was to end.
abstract: Guatemalan’s highest court rules that Atty Gen Claudia Paz y Paz must step down in May, seven months before her four-year term ends; ruling is condemned by local and international human rights organizations, who call it victory for groups that opposed Paz y Paz’s prosecutions of organized crime and retired military officers accused of rights violations.
lead_paragraph: The country’s highest court ruled that the crusading attorney general, Claudia Paz y Paz, must step down in May, seven months before her four-year term was to end.

headline.main: Guatemala Court Rules to Curb Crusader
headline.print_headline: Guatemala Court Rules to Curb Crusader

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
